Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: In certain stages in the original game and the Unleashed Project, settings for Sonic's physics have overrides. Adjust this option according to whether you are playing the original game or the Unleashed Project to remove redundant overrides, allowing Sonic to handle more consistently. Or, set it to 'none' if you are not playing either of those (for example, a different stage mod).

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Select whether Modern Sonic will use the altered physics of this mod or not.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Select whether Classic Sonic will use the slightly altered physics of this mod or not.
Load stage files recommended for use with the original game. This setting also addresses a glitch that can occur in Crisis City Act 2.
Load stage files recommended for use with the Unleashed Project.
Use Unleashed style physics with the Homing Attack mapped to the Boost button.
Use Unleashed style physics with the Homing Attack mapped to the Jump button.
Load no physics settings from this mod for Modern Sonic.
Enable the slightly altered Classic Sonic physics.
Load no physics settings from this mod for Classic Sonic.
